attributes.action: Change the National Curriculum to promote real life skills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many children are emerging from our education system without the skills required for life as an adult. A child might be a genius at science or maths, but knowledge of everyday skills such as cooking, DIY and money management. We need to stop education being a means to a qualification and have it as it is meant to be: Preparation for life.
